body_content.explanation: the intentional ending of a pregnancy:
examples: Abortion is illegal in some countries.
She decided to get an abortion.
She had an abortion when she was a teenager.

body_content.explanation: the early, unintentional ending of a pregnancy when a baby or young animal is born too early and dies before it is fully developed:
examples: The virus can cause abortion in cattle.
We expect to see late abortions and birth abnormalities as a result of the radiation leak.

body_content.explanation: something considered to be a complete failure or to be extremely bad or ugly:
examples: This is an abortion of truth.
One local man described the new building as "an abortion".
